00015 //------------------------------------------//
00016 //
00017 // Structure of the HELP.RES :
00018 //
00019 // <Area X1>, <Area Y1>, <Area X2>, <Area Y2>
00020 // <Help Title>
00021 // <Help Text>
00022 //
00023 // <Page Break Code, CTRL-L>
00024 //
00025 // <Area X1>, <Area Y1>, <Area X2>, <Area Y2>
00026 // <Help Title>
00027 // <Help Text>
00028 //      .
00029 //                .
00030 // (Another help block, continue)
00031 //
00032 //------------------------------------------//
00033 
00034 //---------- Define struct HelpInfo ------------//
00035 
00037 struct HelpInfo {
00038     enum { HELP_CODE_LEN=8, HELP_TITLE_LEN=100 };
00039 
00040     char  help_code[HELP_CODE_LEN+1];               // either identify the help message by help code or area position
00041     short area800x600_x1, area800x600_y1, area800x600_x2, area800x600_y2;
00042     short area1024x768_x1, area1024x768_y1, area1024x768_x2, area1024x768_y2;
00043     short monster_human_interface;                  // 0 when display for both interfaces
00044     // 1 when display only for monster interface
00045     // 2 when display only for human interface
00046 
00047     char  help_title[HELP_TITLE_LEN+1];
00048 
00049     char* help_text_ptr;                            // offset of the help text in the text buffer
00050     short help_text_len;                            // length of the help text
00051 };
